column1: Local Foods////I think I must have somehow missed the bus on Local Foods. Everyone I know who has tried the place out adores it
column3: it's a complete miss. The food is nothing short of bland
column4: and while it's obvious that they prepare everything fresh and with great individual ingredients
column5: the combinations are lost on me. On paper
column6: everything looks fabulous. On the plate? Not so much. I've tried ordering several different items
column7: and I have yet to find something that hits the spot. Sorry
column8: Local Foods. I want to like you so much
column9: but all I can muster is "eh."
